name: Fenrir Unchained
description:
Fenrir Unchained is a student made project for game design workshop over the course of a semester. It's a puzzle action platformer in a Norse mythology setting.

The game can be played with WASD and mouse controls or with an xbox controller.

Controls:

Movement- WASD or Left joystick

Dash- Left Click or Left Bumper

Aim- Shift or Left trigger

Call spear (while aiming)- Right click or Right trigger

Summon wall- E or Right Bumper
